DOC.brief_title: The Effects Exercise Training Shoulder Neuromuscular Control
DOC.detailed_description: Significance The human shoulder complex sacrifice stability exchange large range motion necessary hand manipulation . Due inherent instability bony congruence ligament constraint , dynamic control muscle play important role stabilize shoulder motion . The rotator cuff muscle serve chief stabilizer shoulder joint , deltoid provide torque necessary motion . Therefore , coordination deltoid rotator cuff muscle essential smooth efficient shoulder function . Impairment neuromuscular control muscle may lead injury pain . Consequently , rehabilitation program aim restore normal neuromuscular control shoulder muscle order help decrease pain improve shoulder function . Although rehabilitation program demonstrate positive effect pain decrease functional improvement , still unknown serve improve neuromuscular control shoulder muscle . While deltoid provide torque necessary elevation shoulder , also produce superiorly directly force glenoid . This shear force tend pull humeral head superiorly , result decrease subacromial space . When rotator cuff muscle function properly , line action rotator cuff muscle result center force , help maintain humeral head center glenoid fossa . However , hypothesize rotator cuff muscle able produce sufficient force arm movement , superior shear force produce deltoid result humeral head superior translation . This abnormal displacement result impingement subacromial tissue ultimately lead tissue injury pain .
